sn52.10:3.1: 10. Bāḷhagilānasutta
sn52.10:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā anuruddho sāvatthiyaṃ viharati andhavanasmiṃ ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
sn52.10:4.2: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yenāyasmā anuruddho tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
sn52.10:5.1: “Katamenāyasmato anuruddhassa vihārena viharato uppannā sārīrikā dukkhā vedanā cittaṃ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhantī”ti?
sn52.10:5.2: “Catūsu kho me, āvuso, satipaṭṭhānesu suppatiṭṭhitacittassa viharato uppannā sārīrikā dukkhā vedanā cittaṃ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhanti.
sn52.10:5.4: Idhāhaṃ, āvuso, kāye kāyānupassī viharāmi … pe …
sn52.10:5.7: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharāmi ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ—
sn52.10:5.8: imesu kho me, āvuso, catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu suppatiṭṭhitacittassa viharato uppannā sārīrikā dukkhā vedanā cittaṃ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhantī”ti.
